content: want you can knit the texture on needle 1 and 2 repeat rounds 1-2 of the mermaid texture ending on round 2 for as many rounds as desired for the length of the leg heel for my socks i love the fish lips kiss heel and i will include a link below this is not a free pattern so i have included instructions for a standard short row heel instead http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/fish-lips-kiss-heel these videos may be useful when working the heel knitting help - wrap and turn w&t - youtube knitting help - picking up wraps - youtube for these socks the heel will be worked on needle 2 set up row knit across needle 1 row 1 knit 27 31 35 w&t row 2 purl 26 30 34 w&t row 3 knit 25 29 33 w&t row 4 purl 24 28 32 w&t continue in the following fashion each time knitting or purling one less stitch and wrapping the last unwrapped stitch when you have completed the first half of the heel you will have 10 11 12 wrapped stitches either side of the central 8 10 12 stitches second half of heel row 1 knit to the first wrapped stitch w&t this stitch now has two wraps row 2 purl to the first wrapped stitch w&t this stitch now has two wraps row 3 knit to the first double wrapped stitch pick up both wraps and knit them together with the stitch w&t the next stitch this stitch now has two wraps row 4 purl to the first double wrapped stitch pick up both wraps and purl them together with the stitch w&t the next stitch this stitch now has two wraps repeat row 3 and 4 until you have worked all but one of the wrapped stitches you will end on a right side row you will still have one double wrapped stitch on the right hand side of the sock but we will knit this later foot once you have knit the heel on your sock you are ready to continue down the foot of the sock setup round needle 1 work across instep in pattern needle 2 knit the wrap and the stitch together continue working in the mermaid texture down the foot of the sock regardless of whether you knit the texture on needle 1 and 2 in the leg the stitches on needle 2 must now be knit in stocking stitch knit all stitches as this will be the sole of the sock continue as above until your sock reaches 2 inches short of your desired foot length then proceed to the toe toe round 1 knit 1 ssk knit to last three stitches k2tog k1 repeat on needle 1 and 2 rounds 2-3 knit all stitches round 4 knit 1 ssk knit to last three stitches k2tog k1 repeat on needle 1 and 2 rounds 5-6 knit all stitches round 7 knit 1 ssk knit to last three stitches k2tog
